text: Katharina Gerlach (born 19 February 1998, in Essen) is a German tennis player. She has won four singles and six doubles titles on the ITF Circuit. On 11 November 2019, she reached her best singles ranking of world No. 233. On 2 July 2018, she peaked at No. 238 in the doubles rankings. Gerlach made her WTA Tour debut at the 2015 Nürnberger Versicherungscup, partnering Lena Rüffer in doubles. They lost in the first round to eventual tournament champions, Chan Hao-ching and Anabel Medina Garrigues. ==ITF Circuit finals== ===Singles: 11 (4 titles, 7 runner–ups)=== {| |-valign=top |
